DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Credentials
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Create user credentials that are used for active defense purposes.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Pocket Litter
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Place data on a system to reinforce the legitimacy of the system or user.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Software Manipulation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Make changes to a system's software properties and functions to achieve a desired effect.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Content
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Seed content that can be used to lead an adversary in a specific direction, entice a behavior, etc.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: PCAP Collection
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Collect full network traffic for future research and analysis.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: System Activity Monitoring
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Collect system activity logs which can reveal adversary activity.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Behavioral Analytics
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Deploy tools that detect unusual system or user behavior.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Security Controls
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Alter security controls to make the system more or less vulnerable to attack.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Baseline
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Identify key system elements to establish a baseline and be prepared to reset a system to that baseline when necessary.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Network
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Create a target network with a set of target systems, for the purpose of active defense.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Network Monitoring
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Monitor network traffic in order to detect adversary activity.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy System
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Configure a computing system to serve as an attack target or experimental environment.
